text:
Tableau | Seattle WA, Kirkland WA | ONSITE

Our team is in the early stages of designing and implementing new mechanisms for Tableau's products to seamlessly create and share their work with one another, and helping facilitate continued strategic architectural investments towards improved productivity.

We're looking for good people who are software engineers with 5+ years of experience in at least one OO language (e.g. C#, Java, or C++) with experience seeing projects end-to-end. Experience with file versioning, XML, and/or XSD is a plus.

Opening is here: http://rolp.co/96Ux9

If you're interested, ping me directly (Trevor Hall, the hiring manager: trhall@â€¦) and we can chat.
